ingredients.item: 500g pack essential Waitrose British Pork Lean Mince
350g tub essential Waitrose Tomato and Basil Sauce

instructions.step: Heat the oil in a large pan and brown the mince. Add the tomato and basil sauce, cover and cook gently forÂ 10 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Meanwhile, cook the linguine in boiling water for 4 minutes, then drain.
Add the spinach to the mince and cook until wilted, toss into the linguine and serve with grated Parmigiano Reggiano.
